text:
Deepika Padukone and Ranveer Singh’s wedding was one fairy-tale affair. The couple tied the knot on November 14 and 15 in two different traditions and made the fans restless as they awaited their wedding pictures.
Last night DeepVeer shared the pictures’ of them as man and wife and left the entire world swooning. Within a minute, their pictures went viral on social media and everyone showered blessings for them.
Indiatimes
Deepika looked every bit beautiful as a Sabyasachi bride. The moment DP’s pictures as bride were out, our eyes went on her huge engagement ring. The rectangular shaped solitaire on Deepika’s hand has left everyone talking and estimating the worth of it. As per reports online, the price of the ring is between 1.3- 2.7 crore gifted to her by hubby Ranveer.
Indiatimes
While Ranveer's stunning yet simple gold band ring is gifted by Deepika's family. It's the tradition by them to wash groom's feet and then give him the gold ring with a sacred thread on it. Ranveer and Deepika's wedding pictures bought happy tears in everyone’s eyes. Even their B Town friends showered all their love on them. Karan Johar even suggested them for, nazar utar lo, after all, they looked just perfect and dreamy.
